meta.job_title: Senior Time and Attendance Systems Analyst

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement Time and Attendance tracking processes and systems
Document existing systems and processes in collaboration with end users
Provide recommendations on future technology and processes
Prepare presentations and briefings for the executive team
Assist in implementing new Time and Attendance systems and applications
Conduct data analysis and define reporting
Work between business areas and IT departments to ensure alignment with business goals

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Information Systems, or a related field
